prompt:
Image Prompt:
Create an ethereal and majestic depiction of Jehovah, the Almighty God, inspired by biblical descriptions. Show a radiant figure clothed in robes of light, standing amidst swirling clouds, with rays of divine glory emanating from His presence. Include symbolic elements like a glowing crown or a representation of the Ten Commandments to signify authority and holiness. Capture the awe-inspiring and reverent nature of Jehovah, conveying a sense of divine power and grace through the visual representation.
